website_summaries.verdict: Despite the lack of pockets, we love this tote's unique reversible design, classic good looks, and bonus coin purse. It also looks more expensive than it is.
pros: This well-made tote bag is like having 2 bags in one because it is reversible
It's also available in numerous color options and comes with an attractive coin purse for added carry space
cons: The downside of the reversible design is that it doesn't have additional pockets
Arrives with a strange chemical odor that might fade over time

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this bag, it's perfect for travel and everyday. Very roomy and comfortable to carry even when its full. For the price I can't complain. CON: I got caught in a light rain and it left black stains on my white shirt. :( I ordered the Black/Brown. I try to turn the straps on the brown side when I carry it to avoid the color bleeding onto my clothes and it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Felt so so about this purse from the start, ...
customer_reviews.text: Felt so so about this purse from the start, very unhappy now. It's heavy even without anything in it and kind of bulky. After a month, the straps are coming apart. Steer clear. Cheaply made....sometimes you get what you pay for 😐
customer_reviews.author: CarlottaB

customer_reviews.title: Peeling in less than 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: REVISED review: I initially gave this bag 4 stars. I now have had it less than 2 months and the handle is peeling. It's gotten normal use. I don't even put it on the ground on the floor of the train! You really do get what you pay for. It's best to get leather even if it's more expensive because it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag I bought the bag to use for my laptop and other things for when I travel. I used it this week to go to New York, it held my laptop and chargers, my wallet, my kindle, wallet and earphones and shoes for changing when I got to the office. I put some smaller things in the pouch that I used to have in a zipper pouch in the side of another laptop bag I had. This was so much better and stylish and not heavy. Held up well for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice  but -- stitches show
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the burgundy. It was taupe and when I looked inside, it was burgundy. The problem is that if I turned it inside out to wear as burgundy, the stitches show and it looks like the purse is being worn inside out. The material was good and durable. The size was a good size as well - very roomy. The small purse was nice. The bag was a bit heavy which is good for heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: tricey

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for work and travel. I wanted this look but wasn't ready to pay $200+. This bag totally delivered! It did well traveling and was light. I even saw someone with the same bag on one of my flights. I highly recommend as an all around bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K. J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag, I bought it to carry my school ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag, I bought it to carry my school stuff and it's very sturdy. I also accidentally spilled my lunch and the bag was very easy to clean. The bag looks expensive which is great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: barbara91

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke already 😑
customer_reviews.text: Well I did like it, but the strap broke after just a couple of weeks. I didn't even carry anything heavy in it! Lame... 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tote bag!!! Bought it for a carry on for a short plane trip and ended up using as my "purse" all weekend. I haven't turned it to black at all, because I love the tan!! I've had plenty of compliments from younger and older ladies alike!! My money was well spent on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Bowen

customer_reviews.title: A great bag with no pockets
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Made from a nice, supple leather substitute. Lightweight. Cute in a lowkey way. Truly reversible, looks good both ways. Very, very solid for the price. Cons: That little internal pouch you see in the pic? It holds NOTHING. I was hoping it would be like a makeup bag but it can barely hold a US quarter, if that. And there's no pockets or internal divisions of any kind, making it a nightmare to fish through if you carry stuff. Recommended if you only carry a few items in your bag, or if you don't mind providung your own organization through pouches, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it's made out of rubber
customer_reviews.text: This bag does appear to be high quality. But....It feels like it's made out of rubber. You would think that it would withstand anything then. I have been using the bag as a work tote for about a month now. I have everything a girl could need in it and the handle is now tearing off of the bag. turns out it is not good quality and can not stand up to a working moms needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best purse ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purse ever!! So sturdy, great material. Lots of people think it's real leather. When you reverse to the black side you get a little more structure than the brown side because the seams are on the inside at that point. But I use it both ways and it's awesome. Big enough for my iPad, notebook, wallet, keys, lotion, cellphone, and the little bag with lipsticks and such. I think I'll be getting this in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Use it for work
customer_reviews.text: Great tote my boss who is younger than me loved it so much she ordered 2 looks snd feels like lesther but not heavy like leather got it fast ... i got tired of carrying a purse and a lunch now i throw it sll in this tote and still have room for a bottle or 2 of water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've just received this bag and so far so good. It looks like the picture, and I was pleasantly surprised that it appears to be well made and durable... Especially for the price! I'm using this bag for work and it holds everything I need: laptop (approx 14 inches), notebook, book, planner, sweater, cosmetics bag, and wallet and there is still room for more. The straps are a good length and it's very comfortable to carry (doesn't dig into my shoulder). I definitely think this is a great deal and would reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large, I liked the combination of colors.
customer_reviews.text: Great size and it comes with a matching small zippered pouch. I wanted to like this bag and it almost made the mark. Pros: large but not huge, sturdy, and durable (seems like it’s well Made and could stay in good shape for years), Cons: The resting bag slumps with weird angles and it instantly looks cheap. A few places with loose stitching.
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bag daily for about 2 months. I have carried school books in it and now I am using it for just every day use. I am a paramedic and just tend to throw this in the back seat of the ambulance. It is withstanding my manhandling so far, lol. I know it is reversible and has the detachable pouch but I kind of wish it had inner pockets. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bag feels and looks great!! And so far it's quite strong. I am a little nervous that with my laptop, power cord, notebook and wallet, it feels a little heavy on the thin straps -- but so far it's held up. My only request would be that I wish it had a couple of pockets built in -- but for the price -- I don't think you could ask for better. I've just taken to carrying a couple different mesh pouches in it so I can find my pens and wallet and stuff. I love the phrase "vegan leather" - that's how I refer to it all the time :).
customer_reviews.author: WMAK

customer_reviews.title: It's A Heavy Bag, But Okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm not as thrilled with it as I had thought I would be. I ordered Dark Khaki/Black and I didn't realize that if I wanted the khaki color I would have to turn the bag inside out. I almost sent an email to complain until I realized that was just the way the bag was. When you reverse the color, then you get some heavy seams that show on the outside. The bag itself is also heavy, but I do like the size and will keep it. I probably won't use it for my original plan, but will definitely find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: SoManyBooks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Within a month, the side seam at the top began to pull apart. I love the look of the purse and the size of it, so I will try to sew it back together.
customer_reviews.author: TDD

customer_reviews.title: just exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. another reviewer said that this bag stands up independently. this has not been my experience. it is indeed reversible. i dont think it would withstand being turned inside out frequently, though. i ordered the brown and pink and keep the brown out. it does hold quite a bit. ive been using it as my work bag. it easily holds documents without requiring folding. i imagine it would hold a laptop just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up after use!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for work and I was pleasantly surprised when it came! I loved this bag when I first got it. The material doesn't look cheap and it's fun to have the reversible option. However, the straps are peeling at the seems after only having it for two months which makes me feel like I will be replacing it soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that this bag is so cheap. The quality is exceptional. I ordered the camel/black and the colors are so rich along with the leather being so high quality. The magnetic closure works well regardless of how it is turned inside or out, the straps are hearty and hold the weight of a bag well and have enough of a drop to easily throw on your shoulder. I wish it was a little wider to accommodate for a lunch bag at the bottom but even though the base isn't very wide the bag opens extremely wide and will still accommodate a lunch bag along with books, laptops, etc. Perfect teaching bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coral/brown bag and I love it! The only gripe I have is that it comes with a removable piece to keep the bottom flat but 1 it doesn’t stay and 2 the bag bottom is not wide enough to accommodate it. I’ve included a photo to show you what I mean. No big deal I just took mine out. I can’t speak for how it holds up with a ton of weight in the bag but it has done well with what I carry so far. To give an idea of size, here is my bag with a trapper keeper. It fits perfectly and then some. I hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous millennial pink bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bad is absolutely gorgeous. I ordered the brown/pink combo, and I couldn't be more pleased with the pink color. Although it is advertised as a "coral" pink, it is definitely closer to a "millennial pink," which I was thrilled about. The bag itself is super sturdy, and it is large enough to hold multiple books/binders. I was a bit worried that a "reversible" purse would look awkward; I thought for sure the seams would look funny and you would be able to tell that it was reversible, but it transitions flawlessly from one color to the next.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanierunsforfun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work tote
customer_reviews.text: Really gorgeous large capacity tote. I use this for work to bring all the extra daily items besides what's in my handbag. For the price I think this is a pretty good bag. I can tell it will probably only last 6 months to a year, but honestly that's all I really expected of it. I got the black and cognac reversible and the color is just like the picture. It's pretty sturdy and can hold a lot. I've gotten many compliments on it and people can't believe it's a cheapy. Will most likely purchase again if this is still on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Randi N

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY! I stopped using my backpack for law school to use this!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly so much higher quality than I expected for the price! It's nice, thick leather & it's the perfect size for work/school/every day tote as well. I can actually fit my laptop, portfolio, legal pads, planner, wallet, tablet, a drink, and even one of my law textbooks in it ALL TOGETHER when I go to class. I'm afraid it will be unavailable someday & I'll need a new one in case something happens, so I've already bought a 2nd bag just to be safe!! It's that good - I promise. Get it, get it, get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Loving

customer_reviews.title: NICE BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is exactly what I was looking for. I ordered the Camel/Black one and it looks just like the pictures. The only think that is a little strange is the bottom of the bag. They put a flat piece of leather wrapped cardboard (most likely) in the bottom. It looks great! not saying anything bad about it's appearance or quality. It's just weird because it seems too wide for the bag. It would be nice if the bottom of the bag was wider or if the piece for the bottom of the bag was skinnier. Otherwise, all in all a great purchase (:
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looked really cute at first but fell apart after a month of use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a tote bag to carry to work. I park about 20 minutes away from my office and I needed something to carry my lunch, my office heels and my laptop in. This bag was cute and a great deal so I purchased it. The quality seemed pretty good. The fake leather didn't look too fake from a distance, but up close it was noticeable. After a month of daily use of walking with it on my shoulder, the rubber black trip that lines the edge of the straps started peeling off. At first it wasn't too noticeably but once it started it did not stop.
customer_reviews.author: Christy N

customer_reviews.title: cant beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really am impressed with the heaviness of this bag for the price. I love the color of it as well & appreciate the reversibility of it. The magnet is nice on it as well - & the little attached bag is not just because this has no inside pockets. I have to say, the only reason why I'm not giving 5 stars is that I can't imagine the straps will hold up long - maybe I'm wrong - but its a heavy bag without anything in it, & the straps seem flimsy & weak to me. Maybe they'll last - but I just wish the straps did have a little more thickness in them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Grab and go!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was an excellent accessory to have at my recent conference. It held my binder as well as some necessary books. I was able to store snacks, a water bottle and my wallet and phone. There are no mini pockets sewn into the bag or compartments. It may not be the best for someone who has a ton of little items because you may find yourself fishing around in the bag. However, if you use it for larger, grab and go items, it’s perfect! * bonus it’s reversible
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag!
customer_reviews.text: The tote bag has this oversized feel to it and I personally love it. It feels like quality leather for the price you’re paying and it was super easy to alternate between the two colors. I prefer the camel side but the black side looks great and professional too. There aren’t any compartments inside which makes this bag a nice addition for students who need to carry laptops and textbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Selina M

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute purse, great quality for the price. Obviously not real leather, duh. It holds everything, great for traveling. Since it's reversible it's like two purses in one. Comes with a strip of hard fake leather that is colored differently on either side so you can swap out the base of the inside to match the rest of whatever color is inside at the time. Magnetic closure. I wish it had an inner pocket so when you flip it, there was a small pocket on the outside as well. Maybe big enough for my phone or my keys.
customer_reviews.author: knuckles42188

customer_reviews.title: Big, roomy bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's my second one! Great, roomy bag. Love reverse feature. Little additional bag is not necessary- not top zip so not as handy as it could be. I don't travel with these bags, only use bags I can close totally but these are my go to, everyday to work bag. Will hold ipad, small to medium pocketbook, makeup bag, pair of shoes, water bottle.....lots lots lots of space. Can't beat price. I have navy/light blue for over a year, looks brand new, gray/black I'm sure will be equally amazing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stacey

customer_reviews.title: large tote, go with most outfit and can hold everything!
customer_reviews.text: Product is larger than I expected. But I purchase it just for carrying my 15 inches laptop, it is perfect for that. Quality looks even better than the price. It probably won't last more than a summer, since I will use it carry laptop and books every day. But, hey.. it is a classic looking tote for $20 ish! I am pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice tote
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, attractive tote. I've had it for nearly a year and it looks like new although I don't use it every day. I sometimes wish that it had one pocket, I think it would be doable, even as a reversible bag but it's quite attractive and I get compliments on it. Easy to keep on my shoulder and there is a piece that sits in the bottom to keep it flat so if one needs to set it on the floor, it will sit nicely instead of flopping over.
customer_reviews.author: Razzy2001

customer_reviews.title: Good travel tote.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of reversible bag. However, I really didn't realize how very large it was. I was going to use it as a pocket book but it is definitely more of a tote bag for me. Good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: gloria m.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag. Based on the reviews I thought it would be good for everyday use instead of using my expensive bags. It is $20 for a reason. Does not look expensive. It looks like fake leather and the seams were already coming apart. I think if you were in school and needed a bag for books this would be a cute, cheap option, but not as a handbag.
customer_reviews.author: ParadiseValley

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand the smell !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot understand how this bag has so many positive reviews. I ordered this bag hoping to take it on my trip to the DR instead of taking two larger more expensive MK bags but I can't because the smell of chemicals is so unbearable it will end up giving me a headache. No one should have to deal with a bag that stinks! I will be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite bag!! Keep in mind that this is a bag you pretty much just dump everything in or organization may be lacking (not much room in that attachment either). It’s a very soft material (not stiff) and looks great for a casual look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just received this bag a couple of days ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag a couple of days ago as I needed a cute carry on for the plane. This bag will definitely be big enough to carry everything. The fabric is supple and the drop of the handles is enough that the bag isn't sitting in my armpit. I have actually started using it as my large daily bag (I keep a smaller crossover for smaller trips). I am impressed with this bag for the price (my coworker has a similar bag but more expensive and I think if we put them next to each other, it would be hard to pick which is which).
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality bag
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful vegan leather bag! I purchased this in the camel/black color, and love both sides of the purse. It's a great size and you're able to fit a ton within. Some leather bags (like Matt + Nat bags) can be kind of creaky or dry when made of vegan leather, but this one feels surprisingly 'buttery,' especially considering the price. Love this, and will definitely purchase more from this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised, I'm not gonna lie. The pictures don't really do this bag justice; it's actually a very sturdy and well made bag. The material is so soft and the quality is great. For the price you really can't get anything better. The only thing is that there are no inside pockets which would be really great but I can see how you can't have that if it's gonna be reversible. Mine did not have any smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seams Showing on Outside Not Very Attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the camel color and was disappointed that it had to be reversed from the black, which meant the seams are on the outside; very disappointing. I guess if I had studied the photos more closely I could have seen this. The bag is very roomy though and will fit my needs for a large tote to carry on the airplane so I will keep it. I did not notice a smell at all like some reported. My only other wish would be for something to be added to the straps to make them stay on the shoulder instead of falling off. Overall, a very nice, roomy tote.
customer_reviews.author: B. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and feels like a real leather
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag and the concept of being interchangeable. And it feels so much like leather, I’d rather have this then real leather. The only complaint I have is by the time I get all my stuff in and I hate load up my bag it’s a little too heavy to carry for a long period of time. And for that reason I took a star off of my review. Other than that I love this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jzt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service! Pretty Bag
customer_reviews.text: I just had to redo my original review. Without contacting me first, this company had read my review and sent me another bag. What a wonderful surprise! My original bag wasn’t quite as sturdy as I’d hoped in terms of some of the stitching around the handle, but I had cut the loose piping off and continued using it because it’s a good bag and it’s still pretty. When I go to buy my next tote bag, it’s going to be from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D Blaisdell Datin

customer_reviews.title: Seriously one of the best deals I've ever found in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best deals I've ever found in Amazon! This bag is a complete steal! Amazing quality materials! And for just $20 bucks!!! Crazy! Can't wait to get more color combos
customer_reviews.author: Dami

customer_reviews.title: Great work bag
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, durable bag -- and it's awesome that it's reversible. The bag is perfect for an everyday work bag, I can easily fit my gym clothes, sneakers and laptop in this bag with no issues. It also stands upright on its own (I hate loose, floppy bags that tip over when you set them down). The fake leather looks heavy duty and high quality, and bag, in general, looks well-made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wessell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag intending to use it for my primary bag for clinical rotations. I wanted something that looked nice and sturdy but I would not mind if I got some scratches on the outside of it. It perfectly fits my 15" MacBook Air and other items as well. It comes with a smaller clutch attached to it, which can be removed. I plan on using that for smaller essentials- hand sanitizer, pens, and hand lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Weighted. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! I purchased the black and gray. I’m 5’5” and with the bag on my shoulder, the bottom of the bag comes to my lower waist area. It’s weighted like real leather but not too heavy with all the “necessities.” No awkward smell or stiffness. Seems thick and durable and not like a shopping tote or a lunch bag tote. It’s definitely a tote sized purse. Love it! Only wish it came in black and red.
customer_reviews.author: HollyB

customer_reviews.title: Love my new work bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my bag! I purchased this as a new work bag. But it has quickly turned into my “mom bag” where I can throw everything in it that my son and I need for the day and we are on the go! It’s super sturdy, high quality, and the additional pouch helps keep my keys and cell phone easily accessible. Will purchase another in a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dst1913

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and affordable with minimal downsides
customer_reviews.text: This tote is stylish and affordable! It looks more expensive than what you pay for it. A couple of downsides I’ve noticed so far are that it is pretty heavy, and the lack of pockets/compartments inside (to keep it reversible) is frustrating. All of my stuff just jumbled down at the bottom. An definite pro to this tote is that I was able to sneak drinks, two sandwiches, two small bags of chips AND candy into a movie with no issue :) Overall, I’m pleased with my purchase and would recommend this tote to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: product is good but it misleads you into thinking it is reversible
customer_reviews.text: product is good but it misleads you into thinking it is reversible.. if you change it the tag comes out and the magnet no longer works.l Also it is listed and shown as brown/coral brown should be primary color and instead coral is.... bad description on this product for sure and since I didn't get a slip in the box I couldn't (didn't no how) to return which I sure would of..
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 months ago, and the handles have loose threads everywhere and the materials is coming off. I had a very similar tote from Nordstrom that cost not much more than this one and lasted me years, but decided to give this one a try only because I needed it in a hurry and had prime shipping. After the first month, the handles started falling apart. Save your money on this one. You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: G's  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vegan tote!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bag for the price! It’s incredibly roomy and the vegan leather looks like high end pebble leather. It doesn’t look or feel like plastic. It hangs nicely next to the body, with a long enough shoulder strap to wear over a winter coat. There’s even a magnetic snap to hold the sides together at the top. Plus gussets in the side allow the bag to expand when full. An incredible buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Trialanderror

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this bag but I couldn’t and returned it - unusual for me. It is heavier than expected and it really is not reversible. On the “reverse” side the handles are poorly attached and the edges, especially on the bottom, are just sloppy. I had wanted it for the color that was on the “inside” but, as I would not use that side, it was not of interest to me.
customer_reviews.author: RGT

customer_reviews.title: Best Tote Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the quality based on the price and a few of the bad reviews on here. However, after purchasing I must admit this is one of the best bags I have ever owned! It looks expensive and like real leather! I love that it is reversible, so far I have only worn it brown side out and I leave the brown side of the inside base of the bag facing up so it contrasts with the black interior. Update: I had every right to be skeptical. The handles started to fray. I guess that’s what you get for buying a cheap bag made overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Aamina

customer_reviews.title: Great purse, a few minor things
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camel/black bag and while, in my opinion, the quality is very high, there are a couple of things that bother me a little. First off, the "stain" of the camel side is a little inconsistent and splotchy. Nothing crazy, but there are a couple spots that are a little bit lighter, that might other people. The main reason that I rated this 4/5 stars is that when the black side is facing out, the seam of the back is pushed inward and it makes the bag a little smaller and a little awkward. Again, nothing terrible, and all in all, I'm very pleased with my purchase, especially for the price. I would recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my vegan mom for Christmas. It is gorgeous and I’m considering getting one for myself. The fact that it’s reversible is great because you can switch up colors depending on your outfit. Extremely good quality and you would never know it wasn’t leather. Your getting above average quality for the price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2-in-1 tote bag
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this tote! So far it is holding up really well. I was undecided on which tote bag to buy for school, and I am really glad that I got this one. I love that it is both the camel and black, it will go with everything. It is large and holds my laptop and also a binder (it could even hold both but I don't want to kill my shoulder). It also comes with a great small clutch bag and an additional puff keychain that attaches to the bag. Excited to continue to use this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag but have to return due to weight
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, its the color I have been looking for however, the bag is very heavy without anything in it so it will probably be too heavy for my shoulder or arm with my things in it. It seems like it weighs a good 5lbs empty. It is very well-made and a good size. I have several bags made like this but another brand and they are pretty light. I'll have to return it; its too heavy for my shoulders. I really like it except for that one detail.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Cute reversible tote
customer_reviews.text: Stylish tote purchased for work. I love that it’s reversible, but have only used it with the black side showing. It’s pretty durable as I’ve put some heavy books, lunch bag, and a large full stainless steal water bottle in it daily for work. The straps are already wearing and showing some threads, however.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tote!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I gave been looking for a go to tote for ages but could never find exactly what I need. I travel a lot, this tote is great. Easily holds my laptop plus phone, umbrella, water, etc. Love that it is reversible, and love the small clutch. It is really like 3 bags for the price of one. Looks and feels so much pricier than it is. Excellent value, syper stylish, very practical. Buy this tote!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a limited time
customer_reviews.text: Looks more expensive than it is. Nice construction and the attached clutch is a lifesaver in open totes like this. I find the weight to be a bit much considering i don't carry many things on a daily basis other than keycard, phone wallet case,kindle, makeup bag with essentials, and a card case. It looks very professional and have received compliments on it. I'm bummed that it hasn't yet been a year of use and the sides of the handles are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: HelloItsIo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well I learned my lesson and will remember in the future that if I want quality I shouldn't look for a deal. This is made in China and has that fake leather groddy smell. The edges have poor closure and look unfinished. It looks cheap and is not as spacious as I thought it would be. Bought this as a travel bag, probably won't ever use it.
customer_reviews.author: couldbutwont

customer_reviews.title: Lots to love - one thing to hate
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of things to like about this purse. It's roomy and stylish. The handles are attached firmly to the bag. It looks good no matter which side is turned out. However, I am disappointed to say that it's not the quality I was hoping for: the trim is starting to peel away already even though it's only a couple months old. This is happening on the handles and also around the top of the bag as shown in the photo. Additionally, the seams of the small attached wallet have split even though I barely use it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida2013

customer_reviews.title: One great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a trip I recently took and am extremely pleased with it. The versatility of being reversible (dark to light) was a plus at first but I really appreciate it, getting two for the price of one. It is soft and supple and holds a ton of stuff! My 13' laptop/tablet fit perfectly and there was still room for a lot of other travel stuff. The magnet that holds the flaps together was strong, too. I would definitely purchase this product again and will use it on future trips!
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: An all around great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around great and versatile bag! It’s exactly what I needed for day to day and travel. I bought an organizing insert since it’s a simple shell, but the leather is nice. The only critique I have is that the magnetic closure shows a little more than I would have liked. It looks exactly like the posted pictures.
customer_reviews.author: rjzmg

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This bag seems well made. My complaints are that the inside base is not attached so stuff slides underneath it. There aren't any pockets on it at all so staying organized is impossible. It isn't as big as I thought is was going to be and the magnet closure does not stay closed. Overall this is a stylish simple bag. It looks nice and is good for occasional use but not the everyday bag I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tote after my other tote (recommended by a travel magazine and purchased at the department store that starts with "N" ) had its strap break while I going thru security on it's second use. Since then I've traveled on several plane trips with this bag. It's roomy, and I love the extra zippered pouch. I've loaded it down with all of my travel essentials including wallet, earbuds, cosmetic bag, quart sized carry ons, water bottle and iPad, and it's still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: The Moon Pieds

customer_reviews.title: Great wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: So far this bag is holding up very well, and it gets a LOT of wear and tear. Perfect size for throwing just about anything in, including a laptop, and whatever else I need for the day. The little insert to keep the bottom stable is pretty much useless and I took mine out after one day, but I didn’t really need it so that didn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet
customer_reviews.text: Love how the bag is reversible and is strong enough to hold multiple textbooks. My only dislike is closing it. You can’t close this bag fully, there’s a weak magnet in the middle of the bag which sometimes closes it. This can be annoying if you had a lot of things in your bag and you want to zip it up or close it for security. That aside, it is a good bag for the price and would recommend for anyone wanting a tote bag who doesn’t care about closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to carry as an everyday tote. As a person who usually carries everything but the kitchen sink, I have found this bag to not only fit all of my belongings but be comfortable to walk around with for hours at a time. The bag is a little difficult to reverse but both sides look great. I have had this bag now for a few months and have not noticed any signs of wear and tear although I've carried it every day. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag - definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag in December of 2018 and have used it every day since. I use it at my day job and out with friends. Looks very professional, but I usually wrap a scarf around the handles for a little extra fun when I’m going out. Large enough to hold all of my belongings, but I do not feel that it is too heavy. The little bag inside is great for small things like chapstick or feminine products. It connects to the inside as well so it is very easy to find. I recommend this bag to anyone looking for enough space, but not for someone who likes a bag with pockets. This bag does not have any pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Neff

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks and feels so expensive. Perfect to hold my laptop and books for school. Stylish and reversible so it’s like two for one price. If I’m not using it for a teacher bag, it would be a cute oversized purse. Definitely one of my better purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag but edging is coming off
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It looks and feels like real leather and it seems to be constructed well. I have not tried to reverse it but it seems like it would be easy enough. The only thing that seems a little cheap is the little gold clip that attaches the small bag to the large bag. After almost a year of having this bag the edging on the handles and bag is peeling off. I didn’t catch it on anything or over use the bag... it just peels off after awhile. Otherwise bag is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok work bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed a work bag that would fit my 13 in laptop, as well as all my other misc. things (snacks, water bottle, keys, etc). It seems to be pretty well made, though I just got it this past weekend so no update on its durability. I really wish there was a pocket or two on the inside, but since this bag is a reversible one there aren't any (not their fault, just something I failed to consider when buying a reversible bag) and my stuff gets all jumbled inside. All in all it's a decent bag though.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: The only tote you need!
customer_reviews.text: This tote is perfect! I bought it to carry to and from work but it has become my everyday bag. I love that I am able to reverse it in seconds to black or brown based on my outfit that day. It is very spacious and I'm able to carry much more than anticipated. I have had this tote for around five months now and I see now major signs of wearing. Another plus? The price! I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie W

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my 3rd bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I just bought my 3rd (two for me, one for my mom). I use mine for everyday running around and one or the other has gone on trips with me. I can fit in a lot of crap (that I usually never end up needing), including my laptop. There is usually at least one compliment on the bag per week. I bought my first about a year ago, and there has been minimal wear and tear which is amazing because I am really hard on these things. I will be buying additional bags for gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY ON A BUDGET!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit weary when I read some of the earlier reviews, but went ahead and purchased because now some of the reviews were really good, too! So the purse arrived and WOW. Dude. It looks more like a $60 dollar tote than a 20$ dollar tote. The quality is really good and so the stitching is clean. I say go for it. I purchased the black and grey. You won’t regret your purchase and especially if you’re on a budget like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wished it held up a little better
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this was reversable. Used daily (I'm very particular and careful with my belongings) Was discouraged as the handles started to come apart after 2 months. I was able to fix. This won't be an everyday bag any longer, and I can't complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish for the price..
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It's very sturdy and has held up nicely even though I cram it full of items that I need for when I commute. Shoes, my kindle, lotions, sprays, sanitizer, headphones etc. The reversible part of the bag is ridiculous because that material would easily show dirt and would be illogical for what I use the bag for but the colors are nice (black & gray). I would highly recommend an everyday tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tote
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this purchase. I needed this to carry multiple folders and things back and forth to work. This is exactly what I needed. Always good to buy something that is exactly what is pictured. Also looks expensive and great little inner purse for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: A staple bag!
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag for 6+ months and it's perfect. For someone like me who isn't obsessed with having a ton of purses and just wants a couple that are versatile, hold up well, do the job, and are attractive, this is perfect. I got the black/brown combo and I love that it goes with everything! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It feels super high quality and I love how it’s reversible. I had to use this one day and put loads in- my 15inch MacBook Pro, notebooks, pencils, water bottle etc. and this thing held up great! This is a great buy is you’re looking for something affordable, stylish and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really love this for a work bag! Fashionable & makes it easy to carry my work items. I will say the piece of fabric that is suppose to sit in the bottom to give more room never stays, but other than that the bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Valpey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This bag was more square and larger than I expected. At first not easy to reverse but I'm sure with wear it will become easier. If it was more $ I probably would have returned it because its not 100% what I was looking for but for under $20 its quality material and will do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work tote
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot. Sturdy. Very soft, reversible. Great for work, I need to carry lots of documents and catalogs as well as Water bottle, makeup bag, wallet, keys, snacks. So happy with this tote. Love the little zippered pouch as well. Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Muska

customer_reviews.title: The faux leather is very convincing and the salmon inside is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on this purse! The faux leather is very convincing and the salmon inside is better than I expected. I appreciate the reversible feature but I've never used it and ultimately wish the bottom panel, which is not secured so as to allow the purse to reverse, was secured to add stability to the purse. I ended up tossing it but this resulted in the purse losing its bottom support and some of its shape. Overall nice item, very happy with my purchase, but I wish the bottom panel was secured or securable.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my schoolbooks and it easily holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and was exactly what was described. I use it for my schoolbooks and it easily holds everything I need. I use the attached pouch as a pencil case. I love the reversible option. It's a little difficult to reverse as the material is very thick. It came with the black side facing out and I put it in the navy side which I love. My only complaint is that the straps are very thin and when the bag gets too stuffed, which it does very often, they dig into my shoulder. For the most part, this is a great bag that is fully able to handle my needs as a grad student.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Vegan leather - you need this in your life!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and looks great! Bought this to use as my daily teacher bag and LOVE it. I’m able to throw my MacBook in there and my lunch bag no problem. Seems to handle the weight great. The material feels great too- soft, not shiny, and I didn’t have any peeling issues like others have had. Fully recommend- and for the price, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: AMomOnTheRun

customer_reviews.title: GREAT carry-all bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it's stylish, supple, versatile and roomy. I needed a bag to bring my work necessities as well as my gym clothes, and this works perfectly; lunch, snacks, water bottle, sneakers and a set of workout clothes. The seller did a great job of replacing the 1st one sent to me which was slightly discolored, responding super quickly and made it super easy! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Honigmaus

customer_reviews.title: ...My husband thought I really splurged!
customer_reviews.text: Its my Meghan Markle bag in faux leather but looks and feels almost like the real thing, even my husband thought I really splurged! Very soft and buttery reversible with attached, detachable wallet great for phone coin purse or lipstick and compact mirror
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've carried this bag for about two weeks, and the straps are already splitting and peeling. I haven't carried heavy items or abused it. It's a cheap bag, so I didn't expect high quality, but I certainly expected it to hold up better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Beekimus

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much I bought a 2nd one for my mom for Christmas. However, both bags came with creases from shipping but I just stuffed them full and the creases seem to be gone. One bag does have a couple small scratches on the bottom were the camel color scratched off. I’m considering sending it back to get a replacement. I do wish the Camel color would have been the primary color with Coral Secondary. It still looks nice but the seams stand out more when it turned the the camel side. It is the perfect size for a work bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT YOU’LL LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love this tote! Of all the bags and purses I’ve bought I’ve never had a tote...this one is very well made, looks like leather...reversible...has the extra little pouche with high quality zipper...it really makes life easier! Gonna get another one right now...before they raise this incredible price!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen I

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG!! It was just what I’m looking for- I have a toddler and tired of carrying around both my purse and diaper bag with snacks, etc. I think this purse is going to be perfect for both my stuff and baby stuff. It’s very soft, and I’m hoping sturdy! I would definitely order in other colors if this one holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura O.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but not long-lasting..
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this bag. It's a great size. Unfortunately, I had to stop using mine because stitching where the handle attaches to the bag ripped apart. I used it intermittently for approximately a year. The only other issues I had during that time was some of the leather flaked off the bottom corners from setting the bag down, and the sides of the straps started coming apart. Overall, I'm happy with getting the amount of use I did out of it for the price. I also received a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: hill207

customer_reviews.title: Two bags in one
customer_reviews.text: First of all when I got my bag, I forgot it was reversible. Until a week later when I wanted to write this review. It’s an amazing purchase. It looks and feels expensive although it was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingislife

customer_reviews.title: nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag its heavy. but it is great quality just a heavy bag for summer
customer_reviews.author: nikki chartrand

customer_reviews.title: I got it so I could reverse it but honestly don't like how it looks as brown so I've just kept ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every day for work and am really a fan. I got it so I could reverse it but honestly don't like how it looks as brown so I've just kept it as black. It fits all the stuff I need for the work day. EDIT: updating this review as the bag is starting to fall apart and I've only had the bag for a few months. it's disappointing because I like the bag a lot but am now searching for a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Colebank

product_meta.title: Scarleton Stylish Reversible Tote Handbag for Women, Vegan Leather Shoulder Bag, Hobo bag, Satchel Purse, H1842
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :15.5 x 5.5 x 13 inches; 1.55 Pounds
 * Department :Womens

 * ASIN :B01M0GEAF0

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #25,409 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #26 inWomen's Hobo Handbags

    *  #40 inWomen's Satchel Handbags

feature_bullets: Coin bag with zipper closure. Shoulder strap drops 9.5".
Tote bag is reversible could be flipped into two colors.
